Actions.Name: Leader's Strike
Actions.Effects: Up to two allies in range 3 can dash 2 spaces and gain 2 vigor.

Actions.Name: Coordinate Strikes
Actions.Description: A foe in range takes 2 damage once for every ally of the [name] adjacent to them, up to three times.

Actions.Name: Marching Orders
Actions.Description: When [name] takes this stance, as an action while in this stance, and at start of each of the [name]'s turns, the [name] and all allies in range 2 can dash 2 in the same direction, or as far as possible.
